Package view

Interface GameCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleLoggerCallback
    public interface GameCallback
    The callback interface in Further Programming Assignment

    The methods is this interface are called upon as specified in the GameEngine interface

    Author:
    Ross Nye
    See Also:
    GameEngine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPlayer​(Player player)
      Updates the view about a player added to the game engine.
      void advanceSlot​(Slot slot)
      Updates the view, notifying it that the wheel has advanced a slot during a spin.
      void initialSlot​(Slot slot)
      Updates the view about the initial slot of a wheel spin.
      void removePlayer​(Player player)
      Updates the view about a player removed from the game engine.
      void updateBet​(Player player, Bet bet)
      Updates the view about changes to a player's bet and points balance.
      void winningSlot​(Slot slot)
      Updates the view, notifying it of the winning slot from a wheel spin.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        void addPlayer​(Player player)
        Updates the view about a player added to the game engine.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that was added

      • removePlayer

        void removePlayer​(Player player)
        Updates the view about a player removed from the game engine.
        Parameters:
        player - the player that was added

      • updateBet

        void updateBet​(Player player,
               Bet bet)
        Updates the view about changes to a player's bet and points balance.
        Parameters:
        player - the player who's bet and points have been updated
        bet - the updated bet

      • initialSlot

        void initialSlot​(Slot slot)
        Updates the view about the initial slot of a wheel spin.
        Parameters:
        slot - the initial slot

      • advanceSlot

        void advanceSlot​(Slot slot)
        Updates the view, notifying it that the wheel has advanced a slot during a spin.
        Parameters:
        slot - the slot the wheel advanced to

      • winningSlot

        void winningSlot​(Slot slot)
        Updates the view, notifying it of the winning slot from a wheel spin.
        Parameters:
        slot - the winning slot
